channel.title: Marangu on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Marangu on Martin's Blog

item.title: Day 14: The Descent (Day 7 of Kilimanjaro part)
item.description: Friday, October 4th The descent from Kili was done very quickly. Not sure if the guides were worried I might not make it down but two of them grabbed me by my arms and almost carried me downhill. When we got back to the base camp at Kibo we were given about an hour to rest and have a warm meal. After that we had to pack all our stuff and head to Horombo.
